pages.text: They will attack nearby players. They drop raw Bear Meat, Bones and Large Raw hide.
They drop feathers, raw Pheasant. they spawn in mid range temperature biomes.

Sheeps drop Sheep Skin, Bones and raw Mutton. $(br)To Shear a sheep, you need to familarize it. Shift Click with a Grain to Feed them once per tfc day. After a few days of feeding, you should be able to shear it.
Horse drop Medium raw Hide, Bones and raw Horse Meat.
Rabbit drop Small raw Hide, Bones and raw Rabbit Meat.
Wolf drop Medium raw Hide, Bones and raw Wolf Meat.
Cow drop Large raw Hide, Bones and raw Beef. You can obtain milk from a cow but you need to be more friendly.
Chicken drop Small raw Hide, feather and raw Chicken.
